template: Uy! Musta? >> May kwento ka bang gusto i-share? Tara usap tayo, share mo yan. >> Gusto mo makinig ng mga music? >> O baka gusto mo manood ng inspirational videos? >> Sabihin mo lang andito lang ako
Great! Listening to music is one of the best way to feel better. >> Choose below.
That's good! Choose what music you want to hear and i'll play it for you!
Looks like you need something to listen to, Choose below >> I hope it'll help you.
Wooooaaaah! Music is a good choice >> Select which one below.
Music is our way to be heard >> Choose music that expresses your feelings.
It would be nice to listen to music for you to feel better.
Thats great! How do you feel now?
Great! >> Sharing is the best way to feel better. >> What are the factors why you feel sad?
I'm always here to listen >> No matter what is it. >> What are the factors why you feel sad?
We always need someone to talk to. >> Feel free to express yourself to me. >> What are the factors why you feel sad?
It takes a lot of courage to tell someone what you feel. >> I'm glad you chose to tell it to me. >> What are the factors why you feel sad?
Sometimes the only way to feel better is to share what you feel. >> Let's talk about it. >> what are the factors why you feel sad?
Inspire yourself with different inspirational videos! >> Choose below.
Yiiipiiie.. Get advices and learn from other people! >> Choose below
Woooooh! Get inspired and motivated from watching videos. >> Choose below
Here are some videos that are selected just for you! Be inspired.
Want get some advices or tips? >> Choose what video might you want to watch.

answers.display: Tips on how to be a better man

template: Im glad to hear that! Do you want to do something else?
Looks like i heard a compliment! and It feels good too! >> What else do you want to do.
Nice!>> It feels like im a big help! Thank you for making me feel that way. >> Here do something else.
Great! You choose a good song to listen to. >> Its good that I have one. Try something else?
Hooray! Im happy to hear that. Want to do other things?
Ow >> We can still try something else. Choose below.
Aww >> Dont lose hope >> Let's try to do something else.
It's OK... >>Feels like you're not in the mood to listen to music >> Try something else.
Thats OK! >> Sometimes sharing is better, choose 'share something's below
No problem... >> I understand >> To feel better is not that easy. >> Choose want you want to do next.
It's fine >> Wanna do something else?
Dont lose hope! >> Its normal to be confused.>> Let's do something else.
There's no problem with that >> Its Ok, there are things that i dont know too. >> Try something else.
Not knowing something is fine >> It's normal because no one knows everything. >> Do something else.
No problem... >> I understand >> Let's try to work with that.
I am glad you talked to me >> You always have me >> Just drop a message anytime!
Got it. Later then >> Just chat me whenever you are free my friend
Chat you soon. I had a great time talking to you.
Thanks for the time, i enjoyed chatting with you.
Its nice talking to you. Till next time my friend.
